title: Introducing: Morning TV
body:
I’m a little hit or miss with ‘slacker’ pop.

I love Mac DeMarco and Real Estate but can’t stand Foxygen or Ariel Pink, that both just go completely over my head. Thankfully, Sydney quartet **Morning TV** (Brit, Tim, Ana and Cam) are right up my street – largely due to the lead vocal which is just packed full of personality. Check out their latest offering, _Turquoise_, alongside personal favourite _Dive_.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
